channel.title: Graduate Diversity
channel.description: Graduate Diversity Calendar for the Department of Chemistry at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

item.title: WCC Bonding with Chemistry Day Camp for Girls
item.description:
Led by current graduate students and faculty, the event is all about playing and learning in chemistry, in an attempt to encourage 6th-7th grade girls to become excited about chemistry!

view the 2015 flyer by clicking here

If you are interested in volunteering, email contact below.

item.title: Retreat for Graduate Women in Chemistry
How to Succeed in Graduate School Panel Discussion
item.description:
All UIUC STEM students from underrepresented minority (URM) populations are invited to attend.

Senior graduate students will discuss: What I wish I knew when I first started graduate school;How to find an advisor; and other issues of interest.
